<OLD>
>
> Ever so carefully, Rattrap stops to sniff the air for hidden dangers and
> slowly moves on while following a not so familiar scent.
>
> " I smell someth'n and no it's not me..  But it's strange ...  I vote we
> keep outa the line of sight and down wind."

> <OLD>
>
> Windlord moved with caution and followed Ratrap.
>


<NEW>

As RAT TRAP and WINDLORD make their way up the path they quickly see a
clearing surrounded by bushes and trees. The statue itself was at the
center of the clearing and it looked as if someone did a quick and not
very good scuplture of the Predacon called BLIGHT!

Kneeling before the statue were several protohumans mumbling in a
strange language. A single protohuman was standing at the statue
trying to offer fruit and berries to it, which is very different then
the glowing rocks WINDLORD and PERCEPTOR had observed them dooing the
last time they had been there.

Perhaps that is why the statue was at first making no response.

However as the MAXIMALS stayed hidden and watched they saw the statue
brighten and then its eyes lit up and lasers fired at the lead
Protohuman blasting him into the surrounding bushes.

"We . . . *ahem* . . . I mean I said No, your tribute is not what we
want!" The voice was that of BLIGHT coming from the statue itself.
"Bring us more of the glowing rocks!"

The injured Protohuman continued to lay in the bushes unmoving, smoke
rosing from his chest.

(TAG)

- Preston
